title: Marketplace for Wednesday, June 19, 2013
byline: Scott Tong, Stacey Vanek Smith, Adrienne Hill, Alex Schmidt, Kai Ryssdal and Audrey Quinn
teaser: The Fed kept its stimulus flowing -- for now. Meanwhile, Securities and Exchange Commission chairman Mary Jo White is pushing for more admissions of wrongdoing in cases of widespread harm to investors. Is there an economic cost to admitting guilt? Finally, what do you get when you cross NBA basketball with Obamacare?
